parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all tags from the instance. Valid values:

*   **true**: removes all tags from the instance.
*   **false** (default): does not remove all tags from the instance.

> If you specify both this parameter and the **TagKey.N** parameter, this parameter does not take effect.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~61012~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to **INSTANCE**.
